---
category: news
title: "Y Combinator-backed Betterhalf.ai announces ESOPs"
excerpt: "With the ESOP buyback option, Betterhalf.ai aims to encourage its existing employees, irrespective of their roles and promote external hiring. Apart from this, Betterhalf.ai sets a trend in the startup ecosystem that ESOP buyback can be started even at the early or Pre-A stage of the business."
